title: Padre Island National Seashore: Things To Do
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do             Things To Do         A clear, sunny day at the park's southernmost boundary, near Mansfield Channel. Four-wheel drive is needed to reach this remote section of the park. NPS photo  Padre Island National Seashore has a wide variety of opportunities for everyone to enjoy its natural beauty and wonder. To learn more, use the menu above or click the links below. For Kids On the Beach On the Laguna Madre Fishing Birding Hunting the Laguna Madre Volunteer
